member.name: T:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainProject.Driver
member.summary: Driver class for the ExportTerrainProject plug-in.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainProject.Driver.Run(System.String)
member.summary: Runs the plug-in with a pre-set filename.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainProject.Driver.CreateXML
member.summary: Creates and saves XML data to the chosen file in the SaveFileDialog.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainProject.Driver.WriteTerrainPage(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Stores data about the TerrainPage into the XML document.
member.param: The XML node to insert data at.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainProject.Driver.WriteTerrainPatch(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Stores data about the TerrainPatch into the XML document.
member.param: The XML node to insert data at.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainProject.Driver.WriteTexture(System.Xml.XmlElement,Voyage.Terraingine.DataCore.Texture)
member.summary: Stores data about a texture into the XML document.
member.param: The XML node to insert data at.
The DataCore.Texture to get data from.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainProject.Driver.WriteVertex(System.Xml.XmlElement,System.Int32)
member.summary: Stores data about a vertex into the XML document.
member.param: The XML node to insert data at.
Index of the vertex to get data from.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainProject.Driver.CreateTextNode(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an XmlElement for text data.
member.param: The text data to insert into the XmlElement.

member.summary: Creates an XmlElement for Vector2 data.

member.summary: Creates an XmlElement for Vector3 data.

member.summary: Creates an XmlElement for Quaternion data.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainProject.Driver.FileStorage
member.summary: Stores the files used into a project sub-directory.
